description: This file appears to be a server-side PHP web page that generates an administrative interface for parental control reports. It includes HTML, JavaScript, and PHP includes for header and footer. The core functionality involves rendering filters for report type and time frame, dynamically fetching report data via AJAX, and displaying it in tables with options for printing and downloading. It is responsible for managing and presenting parental control report data in a web interface.

methods.name: adjust_acs_tb
methods.description: Adjusts the table headers and summaries for the displayed report table.

methods.name: ajaxDo
methods.description: Performs AJAX request to fetch report data based on mode and time frame, then updates the table content dynamically.
